verses.roman:
teṅho ta' caitanya-kṛṣṇa--śacīra nandana
tṛtīya paricchede janmera 'sāmānya' kāraṇa

synonyms: teṅho—He; ta'-certainly; caitanya-kṛṣṇa—Kṛṣṇa with the name of Śrī Caitanya; śacīra nandana—the son of Śacīmātā; tṛtīya paricchede—in the Third Chapter; janmera—of His birth; sāmānya—general; kāraṇa—reason.
translation: Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who is Kṛṣṇa Himself, has now appeared as the son of mother Śacī. The Third Chapter describes the general cause of His appearance.
